廮字的基本解释

廮
yǐng
〔廮陶〕古县名，在今河北省宁晋县南。
安；安止。

廮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐng］
［《廣韻》於郢切，上静，影。］
古地名用字。汉有廮陶县。见《後汉书·桓帝纪》。

廮字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廮； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页352第12
【唐韻】【集韻】於郢切【韻會】幺郢切【正韻】庾頃切，?癭上聲。【說文】安止也。　又縣名。【前漢·地理志】鉅鹿郡有廮陶縣。

廮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
廮字的起名意思

暂无。

廮
Basic explanation of words
廮
yǐng
〔廮陶〕The name of the ancient county is in the south of Ningjin County, Hebei Province.
Ann; Ann.
廮
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐng］
["Guangyun" Yu Yingqie, Shangjing, Ying. ]
Ancient place names use words. There is Lintao County in Han Dynasty. See "Huan Di Ji".
廮
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　廮; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 352-12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Yu Yingqie [Yunhui] Unite Yingqie [Zheng Yun] Yu Yingqie, and the sound of the gall. [Said the text] Anzhi also.　Also the county name. [Pre-Han·Geography] There is Lintao County in Julu County.
